name: PixelArt by PicsArt
description:
New App from PicsArt!
With PixelArt: Coloring App, you can paint & create fascinating pixel images by filling in the number boxes. It's fun and relaxing coloring game both for kids and adult.

Release stress, meditate or just make awesome and colorful images with this awesome and addictive coloring book suits every moment of your life!

EASY TO COLOR
Color the numbers by tapping or dragging your finger on the same numbers while using the right color. Got over the edges? No problem, PixelArt: Coloring App will keep you within the borders.

HUGE LIBRARY
Hundreds of coloring pages with images of animals, flowers, holiday decorations, and more. And the library is always getting updated!

IMAGES FOR BOTH KIDS AND ADULTS
Both adults and younger ones can find pictures and drawings of their taste and interest! Choose the complexity and difficulty you are comfortable with!

PIXEL COLOR YOUR OWN IMAGES
Are the templates simply not enough? Or maybe you have an awesome image you think would look great as a pixelated puzzle drawing? Create your own 8bit images by choosing pictures from your Gallery!

EASY TO SWITCH COLORS
Done with coloring one part? Just one tap and you are ready to continues with another color.

SAVE & SHARE
It’s super easy to Save your final image or progress video to your library, as well as share the drawing on PicsArt, Instagram, and other social networks you love!

GO GOLD
PixelArt Gold gives you access to HUGE LIBRARY OF COLORING PAGES! Additionally, PixelArt Gold allows you to convert your own images into pixelated coloring templates.
